name: praseodymium oxide to generic market for mischmetal | mischmetal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1307/documentation

This dataset provides an outlet for surplus praseodymium oxide from co-production with other rare earth oxides. This dataset implies an assumption that a surplus will add to the praseodymium content of the general mischmetal (mixed rare earths). This route should be replaced by a dataset representing the marginal application of praseodymium, as soon as this becomes available.

This linking activity starts from the supply of surplus praseodymium

ends with the supply of mischmetal
category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: This is a linking activity between two markets, without any other activity. It has no other inputs and outputs.
